summary: REQ-1 (adding the new Market Making Challenge hackathon entry in AboutPage.tsx) appears implemented, but the diff also modifies additional files outside the requested scope and introduces an unrequested placeholder certificate URL for the new entry.

missing_requirements.requirement: Keep all changes scoped to updating the hackathons list in `frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/AboutPage.tsx` (no other file modifications).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows additional modified files beyond AboutPage.tsx, which violates the stated constraint even though the hackathon entry itself was added.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a placeholder certificate URL (`certificateUrl: "#"`) for the new hackathon entry despite no certificate URL being provided and the non-goal stating not to add/change certificate assets/URLs.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly notes no certificate URL was provided and lists as a non-goal adding/changing certificate assets; the diff introduces a new (placeholder) URL value.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state files (`frontend-file-summaries.txt`, `project_state.json`) unrelated to the requested AboutPage hackathons list change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints require keeping changes scoped to `frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/AboutPage.tsx` only.
